extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Apple Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the device is running MacOS Ventura, watchOS, iOS, or iPadOS to assess vulnerability to CVE-2023-41061.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the device running an affected OS version?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Apple Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Update the device to the latest OS version: watchOS 9.6.2, iOS 16.6.1, or iPadOS 16.6.1 to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the user at increased risk due to their profile or activities?

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Lockdown Mode
extracted_playbook.description: Enable Lockdown Mode on the device to provide additional security for users at increased risk.
